group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All experimental protocols were approved by the ethics committee of Fuwai Hospital and Capital Institute of Paediatrics and were consistent with the Helsinki Declaration. Written informed consent was obtained from the guardians of the children participating in this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed and written consent was obtained for publication.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
